Posts.Content: 11/14/2018 I was diagnosed with invasive mammory carcinoma , I Have a surgeon appt. today and yes Im scared . Is this invasive, is this beatable , i dont know anyone with cancer or that what my recovery rate is if possible. It is localized and small they are saying , but invasive means spread ..All confused.
Posts.Title: Called back after biopsy - invasive mamory carcinoma
